message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $13,500. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $12,500.  I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us. Let's see if we can make this happen!

I understand you're looking to pay $12,500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm still feeling a bit high at $14,000.  How about we split the difference and meet at $13,250? This would be a good deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!
